docTitle.titlePart: Die kinetischen Konstanten des Triplett-Zustandes von Fluoren-Molek체len

byline.docAuthor: H. SIXL und H. C. WOLF

byline.affiliation: Physikalisches Institut, Teil 3, der Universit채t Stuttgart

front.note:
The Cinetic Constants of the Triplet Stale of Fluorene
Molecules
front.div:
The metastable triplet state Ti of fluorene molecules in a fluorene crystal, disturbed by the
presence of dibenzothiophene ("X-traps") was investigated at 1.6 and 4.2 째K. From ESR
measurements a model for the fluoren X-traps is derived. The X-trap molecule is misoriented by
an angle of 2,5째 in the fluorene crystal.
The rate constants for population (s), radiative decay (& D ) and total decay (k) of the three
magnetic sublevels of Ti were determined by analysis of phosphorescence intensity and decay
time in high magnetic field and by optically detected ESR. We find (with z = axis perpendicular
to the molecule, x = long axis):
